name: Devil
wishText: Happy birthday to the most amazing best friend in the world! 🎉🎂 May your day be as special and wonderful as you are. Wishing you lots of love, happiness, and unforgettable moments on your special day. Cheers to another year of friendship, laughter, and endless memories together. Here's to many more adventures and happy times ahead! 🥳🎈🎁✨
